Title: June 2010
Content: 16*n35875a01624**18  in a demonstration of energy transfer, a large pendulum is made by suspending a 7.0 kg bowling ball on a long piece of wire.   a student is invited to pull the ball back until it just touches her nose and then to release it and stand perfectly still while waiting for the ball to return. the following instructions are given:do not push the ball  just release it.do not move your face before the ball returns. (a) explain this demonstration and the need for these instructions.(6)
